Package main.Teams

Class OpposingTeam

java.lang.Object
main.Teams.Team
main.Teams.OpposingTeam
public class OpposingTeam extends Team
An extension of Team which handles generation of opposing teams for the player to compete against. Athletes generated for their teams gain extra stat boosts compared to the player's, and they reward money and points upon being defeated.

  • Constructor Details

    • OpposingTeam

      public OpposingTeam(String diff, Random randGen)
      Constructor. Stores the game difficulty from the main environment and begins generation of enemy team name and arrays.
      Parameters:
      diff - Game difficulty setting as a String; should be "Normal" or "Hard".

  • Method Details

    • genTeam

      public void genTeam()
      Generates five random Athletes to populate the team's array. On Normal difficulty, all Athletes have normal Atk and Def, and on Hard they receive an additional +5.

    • genName

      public void genName()
      Generates a randomized name using static methods from NameGen and uses it to set the team name.

    • genTeam

      public String genTeam(Random rand)
      Generates a randomized name for an OpposingTeam by combining an adjective and noun from adjectives.txt and nouns.txt. If the files cannot be read, name defaults to "Bad Guys".
      Returns:
      String joining the selected adjective and noun.

    • read

      public String read(String filename, int lines, Random rand) throws IOException
      Reads txt files as given by gen() and genTeam(), and returns a random line within the specified bound. If the file cannot be read, throws IOException.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to be read.
      lines - The upper bound of possible lines to read.
      Returns:
      String containing the contents of a random line as chosen based on the specified bound.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the team name.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      Team name as a String.

    • givePrize

      public String givePrize(PlayerTeam player)
      Rewards the player with money and points based on the game difficulty. On Normal difficulty, the player receives the full reward; on Hard, they receive only 2/3 of the amount.
      Parameters:
      player - The PlayerTeam to add the reward values to.
      Returns:
      String informing the player of their rewards.
